title: Three storied | House for sale @ Katubedda ( Near campus )
details:
Three storied | House for sale @ Katubedda ( Near campus )

Land & Floor Area -
15 perches, (4600sq,ft)

Bedrooms -

5 bed
Fully tiled / A/C connections

Bathrooms -

4 bath ( 3 Attached )
shower cubicles

Indoor Specifications -

sitting / Living with open sit-out area
Up-stair large dinning & pantry area (split level)
Kumbuk stair way / French windows
Ceiling fans / iron grills

Outdoor Specifications -

Large front terrace for each floors
spacious L shape garden area

Special Description -

Vacant Position
Entire house made by 9 inch bricks walls
pipe born water, sump with over head tank
3 phase electricity
Eye catching timber ceiling

Parking -

Parking space for another 6 or 8 vehicles

Boundaries -

Surrounded by well built walls with 2 steel & wicket gates

Access road -

15 feet road in front of the house
50m to main Rd

Nearest cities -

Piliyandala / Rathmalana
Boralesgamuwa
